text: According to the signal given by the headquarters, here It should be the place where Dr. Zhao and the others were imprisoned...
I finally saw human beings again
Zhao Feng...or the last recording of Zhao Feng's memory stored in the brain. Everyone is dead, only this one has not been stolen by the Zuan .
This memory recording was placed in the hippocampus of my brain, please quickly took it away. This is the last thing I left to human beings. The people of Zuan will come over soon...
Haoyue, Haoyue, this is the team, the enemy is too strong, we can't resist, if the task is completed, leave quickly, we will use the last Life guards the last glory, please answer
it would be good to eat a bowl of food made by mama...... Team members, take out the balls Lightning cannon, perish with this group of bastards! ! !
